title: Tiger Aspect - Banijay
snippet: The company creates a wide range of critically acclaimed and award-winning programming for all the UK’s major terrestrial and non-terrestrial broadcasters. In addition our creative output now enjoys high profile internationally through commissions for major foreign networks. Tiger Aspect programmes are shown by a host of broadcasters in hundreds of territories.
